channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Protect against React RSC CVE-2025-55182 with Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF)
item.description:
On December 3, 2025, the React team disclosed a critical remote code execution (RCE) vulnerability in React Server Components (RSC), tracked as CVE-2025-55182. The vulnerability allows an unauthenticated attacker to send a specially crafted request to an RSC “Server Function” endpoint and potentially execute arbitrary code on the server. This vulnerability affects applications using React RSC in the following versions:
19.0.0
19.1.0
19.1.1
19.2.0
Patched versions are available, and all customers are strongly encouraged to update immediately. About CVE-2025-55182 According to th...
